column4: so anyone have any info as how I can get skype working on quantal? x64
noone has info on getting skype working on quantal x64? it keeps whining about skype-bin being uninstallable.
yes, but then it depends on skype-bin which is nowhere to be found.
You should get the deb from Skype.com and see if that works
Strange I had it running with the skype wrapper too xD Hmm hmm hmm what ppa were you pulling from to get skype?
yea, nothing out of the norm
did you try a force install?
Give me a momento to check out skype on the ppa
Do you not want to get it from there?
give me a second and I'll get you a link.
